original_text:
For because of the anger of the Lord it came to the point in Jerusalem and Judah that he cast them out from his presence.
And Zedekiah rebelled against the king of Babylon.
korean_text: 여호와께서 예루살렘과 유다에게 진노하심이 그들을 자기 앞에서 쫓아내시기까지 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: For because of the anger of the Lord
it came to the point in Jerusalem and Judah
that he cast them out from his presence
And Zedekiah rebelled against the king of Babylon.
